mdRecord.dcterms:title: Carte topographique du port et de la ville de Louisbourg, assiegé par les Anglais pendant les mois de Juin, Juillet 1758
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lartigue, Pierre-Jérome, 1729-1772
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colored manuscript map of the 1758 siege of Louisbourg showing ships, troop positions, camps and batteries. Includes references to points of interest, notes and description of the English fleet.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Louisbourg (N.S.)--History--Siege, 1758--Maps--Early works to 1800
United States--History--French and Indian War, 1754-1763--Maps--Early works to 1800
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Richard H. Brown Revolutionary War Map Collection
